BEAM.name: BEAM
BEAM.description: Needle to cure covid-19 if shot can kill germs up to 99.99%

BLUECOVID19.name: BLUECOVID19
BLUECOVID19.description: First generation copy of the covid virus

GREENCOVID19.name: GREENCOVID19
GREENCOVID19.description: Second generation copy of the virus it is deadlier

REDCOVID19.name: REDCOVID19
REDCOVID19.description: Third generation copy of the virus the deadliest can shoot bombs at the player

PLAYER.name: PLAYER
PLAYER.description:
Ship that will save earth from Covid-19,it can pick powerups 
 also needles upgrades can be added

LIFEPOWERUP.name: LIFEPOWERUP
LIFEPOWERUP.description: When picked it will add one more life to the health meter

BEAMPOWERUP.name: BEAMPOWERUP
BEAMPOWERUP.description: When picked it will upgrade needles quantity shot and even sometimes angle

FINISHLVLPOWERUP.name: FINISHLVLPOWERUP
FINISHLVLPOWERUP.description: When picked you will automatically finish level

SHIELDPOWERUP.name: SHIELDPOWERUP
SHIELDPOWERUP.description: When picked it will add shield to the player preventing him from instant death

SCOREPOWERUP.name: SCOREPOWERUP
SCOREPOWERUP.description: When picked it will increase score count per each hit

GALACTICLASERPOWERUP.name: GALACTICLASERPOWERUP
GALACTICLASERPOWERUP.description: When picked a galactic laser will destroy all the current enemies

SHIELDS.name: SHIELD
SHIELDS.description: Shield protecting the player displayed only when shield powerup is picked

BACERIA_BOMB.name: BACTERIA_BOMB
BACERIA_BOMB.description: bomb shot by the covid virus enemy

BOLT.name: BOLT
BOLT.description:
galactic laser destroying enemies displayed when 
 galactic laser powerup is picked
